title: Orthodox priest shouts 'Pope, you are a heretic' at Francis in Athens
content:
1. Orthodox priest shouts 'Pope, you are a heretic' at Francis in Athens  Reuters
  2. In Cyprus, Pope Francis Laments Indifference Toward Migrants  The New York Times
  3. Pope Francis returns to Lesbos, Greece, five years after flying migrants out of the camp there  The Washington Post
  4. Protesting Orthodox priest heckles Pope on Greece visit  Associated Press
  5. As pope prepares to visit Greece's Lesbos, migrants hope for change  Reuters
contentSnippet:
Orthodox priest shouts 'Pope, you are a heretic' at Francis in Athens  Reuters
In Cyprus, Pope Francis Laments Indifference Toward Migrants  The New York Times
Pope Francis returns to Lesbos, Greece, five years after flying migrants out of the camp there  The Washington Post
Protesting Orthodox priest heckles Pope on Greece visit  Associated Press
As pope prepares to visit Greece's Lesbos, migrants hope for change  Reuters

localize.title: 正教会の司祭がアテネでフランシスコに「Pope, you are an heretic」と叫ぶ
东正教牧师在雅典对方济各大喊 "教皇，你是个异教徒
東正教牧師在雅典對方濟各大喊 "教皇，你是個異教徒
